tr_quotes.quote: Aşk senin gülüşünde saklı.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gülüşümün sebebiydi gülüşün.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mevsimin suçu yok. Yokluğun soğuk.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sesin diyorum, en güzel ağrı kesici!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç yokken bile herkesten daha çoksun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Zamansız gelme elim kolum dağınıksa sarılamam…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir çift göze aşık ve diğer bütün gözlere körüm…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ver elini yürüyelim, sol yanın, son yolum olsun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sensin, kalbim değildir. Böyle göğsüme vuran…
tr_quotes.author: Sabahattin Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insan var, onca insanın varlığını unutturan.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sana şiir yazmak ne haddime. Varlığın şiir zaten…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gittin… Ve solumda kaldın ve soluğumda ve sonumda.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen bile bilemezsin gülüşün ben de kaç bahar eder.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Çek bakışlarını gözlerimden, aşk bu şeytan doldurur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen bile bilemezsin gülüşün ben de kaç bahar eder.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Konu ne zaman senden açılsa kapatmaya kıyamıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Besmelesiz başladım diye mi doyamıyorum seni sevmeye?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Çek bakışlarını gözlerimden, aşk bu şeytan doldurur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen yeter ki çocukluk yap. Gönlümde salıncağın hazır…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen bana Allah’ın emanetisin. Seni sevmek aşktır bana.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bakıyorum sana, sana baktıkça yarınlarım geliyor aklıma.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Aynı şehirde sen varsın ben varım biz yokuz. Ne acı dimi…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Okyanusta ölmez de insan gider bir kaşık sevdada boğulur…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ey canımın sahibi Yar! Sen benimle olduktan sonra kaybettiklerimin ne önemi var.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Seni benim kadar sevenler, sana benim kadar hasret kalsın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Çünkü öyle güzel baktı ki; Gökyüzü gözlerine sığmamış gibi.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Senin suçun yok hayat ben buraya zaten elveda demeye geldim…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen hep gülümse ki yüreğinin güzelliği gülüşlerinde canlansın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Aşk tüm dünya insanlarının içinde sana tanıdığım ayrıcalıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bazıları konuşmaz gözlerine 5 saniye bakar ömründen 5 yıl gider.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen benim görmek için, bakmaya gerek bile duymadığım ezberimsin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Seninle geçen zaman geleceğimdeki en güzel günlerin garantisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gözlerinin kahvesinden koy ömrüme kırk yılın hatırına sende kalayım!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık insana çok şey öğretirmiş ama sen gitme ben cahil kalayım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sert rüzgârlar karanlık geceleri severmiş, aynen benim seni sevdiğim gibi.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mutlu anlarda herkes birlikte olur. Önemli olan mutsuzluğu da paylaşabilmek…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sevgimiz, yavaş yavaş süzülen çisil yağmur gibi ama ırmakları taşıran cinsten.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: O kadar çok bu kadar çok diyemem sevgin için, aşığım sana gözlerimin ışığısın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İlham perisi kaçmış şair gibiyim… Kalemim söz değil yüreğim sensizlik yazıyor…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sonra sen geldin, güldün, gönlümdeki en kurak topraklar, papatya bahçesi oldu.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Onunla ne zaman lades oynasak hep o kazandı. Kalbimdeyken nasıl aklımda derdim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen beni öyle bir sevmeye başla ki başkalarını bırak ben kendimi kıskanmaya başlayayım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Öptüğün zaman kokusunu içine çekmeyi başardıysan eğer özlerken burnunun da direği sızlayacaktır...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mevsimlerin suçu yok asla! Yok olduğundan soğuk buralar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ben sadece bir çift göze aşığım deliler gibi hem de diğer tüm gözlere körüm bundan sonra.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Zamansız gelme bana elim kolum dağınık ise sarılamayabilirim sana.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yağmur başladığı zaman ıslanabileceği biri olmalı kişinin hayatında.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık kişiye çok şey öğretir. Fakat sen gitme benden asla, ben her zaman cahil kalmaya razıyım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sana şiir yazmayı istedim ama varlığının şiir olduğunu anladım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Koskoca okyanus içinde ölmezsin gidersin bir kaşık sevda içerisinde boğulursun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Güneşin altında söylenemeyen söz yokmuş. Bundan dolayı sadece gece olduğu zaman seni sevdiğimi söylemekteyim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Seni düşündüğüm zaman içim geçmiş severken ömrüm.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Öyle çok yanıyor ki içim dünyadaki tüm suçları ben işlemişim gibi oysa sadece sevmiştim ben.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sana bakmaya bile gerek duymuyorum artık seni öyle bir ezberlemişim ki o bana yeterli.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: A beautiful woman delights the eye; a wise woman, the understanding; a pure one, the soul
en_quotes.author: Minna Antrim

en_quotes.quote: Breathless, we flung us on a windy hill, Laughed in the sun, and kissed the lovely grass
en_quotes.author: Rupert Brooke

en_quotes.quote: I love you the more in that I believe you had liked me for my own sake and for nothing else
en_quotes.author: John Keats

en_quotes.quote: I love Paris for the million reasons that everybody loves the city. It's an incredibly romantic and beautiful place
en_quotes.author: Alan Furst

en_quotes.quote: A tramp, a gentleman, a poet, a dreamer, a lonely fellow, always hopeful of romance and adventure
en_quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

en_quotes.quote: I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: There's nothing more romantic than Italian food
en_quotes.author: Elisha Cuthbert

en_quotes.quote: Heard melodies are sweet, but those unheard are sweeter
en_quotes.author: John Keats

en_quotes.quote: I think laughter and stimulating conversation are the things that truly make a romantic evening
en_quotes.author: Michael Buble

en_quotes.quote: We are each of us angels with only one wing, and we can only fly by embracing one another
en_quotes.author: Luciano De Crescenzo

en_quotes.quote: I am not a dreamer. I am a football romantic
en_quotes.author: Jurgen Klopp

en_quotes.quote: It is better to have loved and lost than never to have lost at all
en_quotes.author: Samuel Butler

en_quotes.quote: There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart
en_quotes.author: Jane Austen

en_quotes.quote: I think everyone dreams of that nice romantic wedding
en_quotes.author: Lance Bass

en_quotes.quote: The sound of a kiss is not so loud as that of a cannon, but its echo lasts a great deal longer
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

en_quotes.quote: Kiss me and you will see how important I am
en_quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

en_quotes.quote: Love planted a rose, and the world turned sweet
en_quotes.author: Katharine Lee Bates

en_quotes.quote: I'm a very loyal boyfriend. I'm a bit of a joker... I can be romantic, but not too sickly
en_quotes.author: Louis Tomlinson

en_quotes.quote: Happy is the man whom the Muses love: sweet speech flows from his mouth
en_quotes.author: Hesiod

en_quotes.quote: All the beautiful sentiments in the world weigh less than a single lovely action
en_quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

en_quotes.quote: I'm not very romantic. My idea of romance is more practical - like washing the car
en_quotes.author: Ty Burrell

en_quotes.quote: What is love? It is the morning and the evening star
en_quotes.author: Sinclair Lewis

en_quotes.quote: My personal decorating style is cozy, romantic and a little rustic, with a sense of whimsy
en_quotes.author: Kimberly Schlapman

en_quotes.quote: I'm a hopeless romantic and passionate person when it comes to love
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

en_quotes.quote: I love you - I am at rest with you - I have come home
en_quotes.author: Dorothy L. Sayers

en_quotes.quote: A man's kiss is his signature
en_quotes.author: Mae West

en_quotes.quote: I'm a romantic; a sentimental person thinks things will last, a romantic person hopes against hope that they won't
en_quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

en_quotes.quote: There's something very romantic about self-destruction and sabotaging your life, and taking a hammer to it
en_quotes.author: Gerard Way

en_quotes.quote: Romance is tempestuous. Love is calm
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: A romantic date for me is sitting in pajamas and being with a guy with whom I can be myself
en_quotes.author: Alia Bhatt

en_quotes.quote: How far away the stars seem, and how far is our first kiss, and ah, how old my heart
en_quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

en_quotes.quote: I'm not done with love, but I refuse to settle. I am a hopeless romantic. And I won't stop till I get it right
en_quotes.author: Halle Berry

en_quotes.quote: All I ever wanted was to be a sexy bride, and actually, I think I've turned into a romantic bride
en_quotes.author: Poppy Delevingne

en_quotes.quote: I love you more than my own skin
en_quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

en_quotes.quote: When I walk with you I feel as if I had a flower in my buttonhole
en_quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

en_quotes.quote: The more we are filled with thoughts of lust the less we find true romantic love
en_quotes.author: Douglas Horton

en_quotes.quote: I am a bit of a hopeless romantic. I really do have a faith and a belief in love, and when I love, I love hard
en_quotes.author: Melanie Fiona

en_quotes.quote: Tradition wears a snowy beard, romance is always young
en_quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

en_quotes.quote: Suddenly I've got an overwhelming desire to surround myself with the aura of classical and Romantic art
en_quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

en_quotes.quote: Love alone could waken love
en_quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

en_quotes.quote: When you look at me, when you think of me, I am in paradise
en_quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

en_quotes.quote: I've never believed in or understood romantic love. Love at first sight was always a complete joke to me
en_quotes.author: Glennon Doyle Melton

en_quotes.quote: There is no instinct like that of the heart
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: Love songs just kind of come out very naturally, me being a very romantic person
en_quotes.author: Cuco

en_quotes.quote: Boys have said in the past that I live my life like a movie. I love all things romantic, like kissing in the rain
en_quotes.author: Mollie King

en_quotes.quote: Savannah is amazing with the town squares and the hanging moss and the French Colonial houses. It's brutally romantic
en_quotes.author: David Morrissey

en_quotes.quote: I've always said that inside of me there is a rocker that wants to come out, but I'm a romantic rocker
en_quotes.author: Luis Fonsi

en_quotes.quote: Satan, really, is the romantic youth of Jesus re-appearing for a moment
en_quotes.author: James Joyce

en_quotes.quote: Love is the silent saying and saying of a single name
en_quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

en_quotes.quote: Romance is the glamour which turns the dust of everyday life into a golden haze
en_quotes.author: Carolyn Gold Heilbrun

en_quotes.quote: I occasionally wear Miss Dior perfume. It's quite elegant and feminine. It reminds me of a romantic evening out
en_quotes.author: Jaimie Alexander

en_quotes.quote: Sadly, people think a guy and a girl can't be friends without something romantic going on
en_quotes.author: Daisy Ridley

en_quotes.quote: I'm a romantic
en_quotes.author: Tom Cruise

en_quotes.quote: I don't know if it's possible to live the rock 'n roll lifestyle and still be romantic
en_quotes.author: Adam Levine

en_quotes.quote: I'm definitely a hopeless romantic
en_quotes.author: LeToya Luckett

en_quotes.quote: A romantic relationship requires honesty between a couple
en_quotes.author: Tzipi Livni

en_quotes.quote: Grunge is a hippied romantic version of punk
en_quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

en_quotes.quote: True love stories never have endings
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: If you don't love me, it does not matter, anyway I can love for both of us
en_quotes.author: Stendhal

en_quotes.quote: And ever has it been known that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: Morning without you is a dwindled dawn
en_quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: Deceiving others. That is what the world calls a romance
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: I am a romantic fool, no doubt about that
en_quotes.author: Alex Turner

en_quotes.quote: If a June night could talk, it would probably boast it invented romance
en_quotes.author: Bernard Williams

en_quotes.quote: Love is friendship set on fire
en_quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

en_quotes.quote: I would love to do some crazy action or even a real romantic comedy. I think that would be really exciting
en_quotes.author: Jillian Murray

en_quotes.quote: I like watching romantic comedies and animation
en_quotes.author: Ileana D'Cruz

en_quotes.quote: When I give I give myself
en_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

en_quotes.quote: Of all the music that reached farthest into heaven, it is the beating of a loving heart
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Romantic love is an addiction
en_quotes.author: Helen Fisher

en_quotes.quote: You feel very romantic when you're in a ball gown. Everyone should wear one once in a while
en_quotes.author: Carolina Herrera

en_quotes.quote: As a hopeless romantic, I'm drawn to stories of improbable beginnings
en_quotes.author: Mary Kay Andrews

en_quotes.quote: Is this not the true romantic feeling; not to desire to escape life, but to prevent life from escaping you
en_quotes.author: Thomas Wolfe

en_quotes.quote: O, thou art fairer than the evening air clad in the beauty of a thousand stars
en_quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

en_quotes.quote: I'm not what you might call sexy, but I'm romantic. Let's put it that way
en_quotes.author: Betty White

en_quotes.quote: I'm sorry, but I can't make a movie with the blonde from 'ER' who is starring in every single bad romantic comedy
en_quotes.author: Matthew Fox

en_quotes.quote: Kisses, even to the air, are beautiful
en_quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

en_quotes.quote: So the lover must struggle for words
en_quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

en_quotes.quote: The underdog winning is the romantic position
en_quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

en_quotes.quote: I find the idea of walking down the aisle and then being handed to the groom by the father very romantic
en_quotes.author: Sushmita Sen

en_quotes.quote: I'm still a bit of a romantic and an idealist and hopelessly naive
en_quotes.author: Brit Marling

en_quotes.quote: I'm a hopeless romantic with a dirty mind
en_quotes.author: Leelee Sobieski

en_quotes.quote: I'm into all that sappy stuff - a surprise picnic, nice dinner, or traveling. I'm kind of an old romantic
en_quotes.author: Will Estes

en_quotes.quote: All the windows of my heart I open to the day
en_quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

en_quotes.quote: I love Indian, Italian and Mexican food. And if it's a romantic type of thing, I like a good French restaurant
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: Learning to give up on perfection may be just about the most romantic move any of us could make
en_quotes.author: Alain de Botton

en_quotes.quote: I saw Tequila Sunrise as a romantic picture with complex, bigger than life characters
en_quotes.author: Conrad Hall

en_quotes.quote: I'm probably a bit romantic about it, but I think we humans miss having contact with fire. We need it
en_quotes.author: Jamie Oliver

en_quotes.quote: Consider what a romantic expedition you are on; take notes
en_quotes.author: Anne Boyd

en_quotes.quote: I think to love somebody every day for a long period of time is the most romantic thing you can do
en_quotes.author: Nick Zano

en_quotes.quote: Wave after wave of love flooded the stage and washed over me, the beginning of the one great durable romance of my life
en_quotes.author: Bette Davis

en_quotes.quote: The romantic view would be that nomads are wonderful people, better than us; they care about the environment
en_quotes.author: Robyn Davidson

en_quotes.quote: I can be a romantic. The way to every woman's heart is through her stomach. Food is at the core of everything
en_quotes.author: Paul Hollywood

en_quotes.quote: French is the language that turns dirt into romance
en_quotes.author: Stephen King

en_quotes.quote: We only part to meet again
en_quotes.author: John Gay

en_quotes.quote: My heart is like a singing bird
en_quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

en_quotes.quote: I'm a big old romantic
en_quotes.author: Colin Farrell

en_quotes.quote: I personally think Prague is more romantic than Paris. If you have a girlfriend, take her there
en_quotes.author: Stephanie Sigman

en_quotes.quote: I love being one half of a romantic couple
en_quotes.author: Julianna Margulies

en_quotes.quote: I don't know what I'd do if I was making a romantic comedy; I wouldn't feel like I was earning my $100 a day
en_quotes.author: Danielle Harris

en_quotes.quote: I'm a horrible romantic!
en_quotes.author: Jamie Campbell Bower

en_quotes.quote: I am a hopeless romantic
en_quotes.author: Tiffany Hwang

en_quotes.quote: The Best Man' was my first feature film, and I didn't want to be known as a director who only does romantic comedies
en_quotes.author: Melissa De Sousa

en_quotes.quote: Everyone who knows me knows that I'm a hopeless romantic who listens to love ballads and doo-wop songs all the time
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: Am I a romantic? I've seen 'Wuthering Heights' ten times. I'm a romantic
en_quotes.author: Johnny Depp

en_quotes.quote: It is possible for a woman to be a romantic, but also to be single and to be happy
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: When I was 18, I thought that, to be a romantic, you couldn't live past 30
en_quotes.author: David Bowie

en_quotes.quote: I love a good romantic comedy
en_quotes.author: Joss Whedon

en_quotes.quote: Death was like love, a romantic escape
en_quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

en_quotes.quote: I think I'll always be a hopeless romantic
en_quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

en_quotes.quote: I don't find these technical things like flowers and chocolates romantic at all. I think Valentine's Day makes no sense
en_quotes.author: Alia Bhatt

en_quotes.quote: I'm a hopeless romantic
en_quotes.author: CM Punk

en_quotes.quote: If you are pro love, you have to be a little bit disloyal to the romantic feelings that propel you in the early days
en_quotes.author: Alain de Botton

en_quotes.quote: I love to have my hair down; I love to have my hair full... there's something romantic about it
en_quotes.author: Blake Lively

en_quotes.quote: I'm not the most romantic guy, although I do try
en_quotes.author: Seth Rogen

en_quotes.quote: For food to be romantic, it should be light. Too many times people plan a romantic meal, and the food is too heavy
en_quotes.author: Jose Andres

en_quotes.quote: I am a hopeless romantic. And I won't stop till I get it right
en_quotes.author: Halle Berry

en_quotes.quote: I believe I can even yet remember when I saw the stars for the first time
en_quotes.author: Max Muller

en_quotes.quote: Natural Born Killers' is really a misunderstood romantic comedy
en_quotes.author: Woody Harrelson

en_quotes.quote: I am a romantic person and maybe have this Hollywood perception of love... but then, it's never really like the movies
en_quotes.author: Markus Persson

en_quotes.quote: I am still a hard-core romantic
en_quotes.author: Divyanka Tripathi

en_quotes.quote: Bombay Velvet' is my most romantic film, it's my 'Titanic' or 'Gone With The Wind.'
en_quotes.author: Ranbir Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: I'm very romantic, I'm extremely romantic. I date my wife
en_quotes.author: Alice Cooper

en_quotes.quote: I'm a hopeless romantic. I buy things because I fall in love with them. I never buy anything just because it's valuable
en_quotes.author: Iris Apfel

en_quotes.quote: My favorite genre is definitely romantic comedy. I love 'When Harry Met Sally.'
en_quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

en_quotes.quote: I am a huge romantic at heart
en_quotes.author: Armaan Malik

en_quotes.quote: I like romantic comedy as a genre, but I think it can get stuck in its ways
en_quotes.author: Zooey Deschanel

en_quotes.quote: I'm very romantic. I've emptied flower shops
en_quotes.author: Bob Hoskins

en_quotes.quote: Any woman can make pole dancing a regular part of their exercise routine - and a fun part of their romantic life!
en_quotes.author: Kendra Wilkinson

en_quotes.quote: I'm pretty romantic
en_quotes.author: Douglas Booth

en_quotes.quote: I want to do more action adventures and more romantic comedies
en_quotes.author: Maria Bello

en_quotes.quote: I've always loved romantic songs
en_quotes.author: Engelbert Humperdinck

en_quotes.quote: I don't take my image seriously. I make fun of the fact that some people think I'm a romantic figure
en_quotes.author: Engelbert Humperdinck

en_quotes.quote: Somebody called me a 'bruised romantic' once, and I like that
en_quotes.author: Susannah McCorkle

en_quotes.quote: Remember, beneath every cynic there lies a romantic, and probably an injured one
en_quotes.author: Glenn Beck

en_quotes.quote: A realist, in Venice, would become a romantic by mere faithfulness to what he saw before him
en_quotes.author: Arthur Symons

en_quotes.quote: There's something about marriage that is not as intensely romantic or interesting as a couple's first meeting
en_quotes.author: John Sandford

en_quotes.quote: Middle age is when a guy keeps turning off lights for economical rather than romantic reasons
en_quotes.author: Lillian Gordy Carter

en_quotes.quote: The writing career is not a romantic one. The writer's life may be colorful, but his work itself is rather drab
en_quotes.author: Mary Roberts Rinehart

en_quotes.quote: I would like to play romantic parts
en_quotes.author: Zach Woods

en_quotes.quote: When I'm romantic, I'll make minted lamb. Yeah, man, I do have my romantic moments
en_quotes.author: Big Narstie

en_quotes.quote: People say the 'Lost Generation' in a romantic sense, but I think it was tragic. They were really lost
en_quotes.author: Corey Stoll

en_quotes.quote: I had my first real kiss at Magic Mountain on a park bench. Not the most romantic thing ever
en_quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

en_quotes.quote: I don't make romantic films. I make films about human relationships
en_quotes.author: Yash Chopra

en_quotes.quote: It's the pursuit of love and happiness that is the driving force of the romantic novel
en_quotes.author: Susanna Kearsley

en_quotes.quote: I am deeply romantic and a genuine yet complex person
en_quotes.author: Jiah Khan

en_quotes.quote: I don't get off on romantic parts. But I often think if I had had my dental work done early on, well, maybe
en_quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

en_quotes.quote: I'm a romantic slob!
en_quotes.author: Willie Nelson

en_quotes.quote: By all but the pathologically romantic, it is now recognized that this is not the age of the small man
en_quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

en_quotes.quote: I'm a romantic. I like romantic movies
en_quotes.author: Chris Evans

en_quotes.quote: I am a hopeless romantic, and so is my wife
en_quotes.author: Nick Cannon

en_quotes.quote: I am very romantic. Given a choice, I'd do only romantic films!
en_quotes.author: Sonam Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: Romance is everything
en_quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

en_quotes.quote: If you look at romantic comedies as pieces of commerce, the audience is looking for wish fulfillment
en_quotes.author: Tom Hanks

en_quotes.quote: A romantic comedy has to be funny and make you think about life; but the obstacle that has to be overcome is key
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

en_quotes.quote: I don't get a lot of romantic comedy scripts
en_quotes.author: Ryan Reynolds

en_quotes.quote: I am very uncomfortable being romantic. I can be funny; I can be all over the place. I can be anything but romantic
en_quotes.author: Amruta Khanvilkar

en_quotes.quote: I believe in the romantic interchange between intellectuals about fashion
en_quotes.author: Virgil Abloh

en_quotes.quote: Numerous studies have shown how when one person in a romantic coupling gets depressed, the other becomes more depressed
en_quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

en_quotes.quote: Usually comedy is only available to us ladies in the romantic comedy. That's why I hate romantic comedies
en_quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

en_quotes.quote: I've never been a blind romantic
en_quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

en_quotes.quote: We owe to the Middle Ages the two worst inventions of humanity - romantic love and gunpowder
en_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

en_quotes.quote: That's my biggest struggle, is maintaining a personal romantic relationship. It takes a lot of effort
en_quotes.author: Chelsea Handler

en_quotes.quote: I love romantic comedies. I have a deep respect for them. I think they're really difficult to write and write well
en_quotes.author: Rashida Jones

en_quotes.quote: You know, I grew up on romantic comedies, and it's hard to find a new way to tell that story
en_quotes.author: Rashida Jones

en_quotes.quote: I love my wife dearly, and, therefore, I've never cooked a meal, romantic or otherwise, for her
en_quotes.author: Steve Carell

en_quotes.quote: There's something about the sound of a train that's very romantic and nostalgic and hopeful
en_quotes.author: Paul Simon

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is the lover's gift
en_quotes.author: William Congreve

en_quotes.quote: Hugh Grant is the main man. He's the number one romantic comedy man in the world
en_quotes.author: Sam Elliott

en_quotes.quote: Be brave, young lovers, and follow your star
en_quotes.author: Oscar Hammerstein II

en_quotes.quote: When I am in love, I am ridiculously and hopelessly romantic
en_quotes.author: Jacqueline Fernandez

en_quotes.quote: I had to satisfy the action fans, the romantic fans, the intellectual fans. It was a terrific burden
en_quotes.author: Sidney Poitier

en_quotes.quote: I've always considered myself a fairly romantic person. I believe in love and falling in love at a young age
en_quotes.author: Mandy Moore

en_quotes.quote: There are certain romances that belong in certain cities, in a certain atmosphere, in a certain time
en_quotes.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: My greatest environments in which I can grow, or grow up, is in personal romantic relationships with a man
en_quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

en_quotes.quote: I am a hopeless romantic and I love to spoil my girlfriends
en_quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

en_quotes.quote: I did send a girl a plane ticket asking her for a visit, I guess that's quite romantic
en_quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

en_quotes.quote: I am the actor that I am. I do what I do. I've been a 'leading man' playing romantic leads for a long time now
en_quotes.author: Pierce Brosnan

en_quotes.quote: I'm very romantic and of course I want to be in love
en_quotes.author: Emma Watson

en_quotes.quote: Romantic stuff is not something I really remember
en_quotes.author: Darius Rucker

en_quotes.quote: Well my biggest dream is to be in a romantic comedy
en_quotes.author: Izabella Scorupco

en_quotes.quote: Any kind of novelty or excitement drives up dopamine in the brain, and dopamine is associated with romantic love
en_quotes.author: Helen Fisher

en_quotes.quote: I've always maintained that men were more romantic than women
en_quotes.author: Helen Fisher

en_quotes.quote: I have such a rich fantasy life, I can't help it. I do make up a lot of romantic stories in my head
en_quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

en_quotes.quote: The romantic embrace can only be compared with music and with prayer
en_quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

en_quotes.quote: Words of love, are works of love
en_quotes.author: William R. Alger

en_quotes.quote: Julia Roberts and Sandra Bullock do romantic comedies. I do dark dramas. I do these movies well
en_quotes.author: Jodie Foster

en_quotes.quote: Everything is just so much more romantic and real when it's yours and it's private
en_quotes.author: Dove Cameron

en_quotes.quote: I'm getting a lot of uninteresting romantic lead guys that look good and fall in love sort of garbage
en_quotes.author: Bobby Cannavale

en_quotes.quote: It is the addition of strangeness to beauty that constitutes the romantic character in art
en_quotes.author: Walter Hagen

en_quotes.quote: I had my baby outside in a thunderstorm. It was really romantic
en_quotes.author: Evangeline Lilly

en_quotes.quote: I don't ever want to be a sentimentalist. I prefer to be a realist. I'm not a romantic really
en_quotes.author: James Earl Jones

en_quotes.quote: Acting is not about anything romantic, not even fantasy, although you do create fantasy
en_quotes.author: James Earl Jones

en_quotes.quote: My new movie, Fools Rush In, is a romantic comedy and the girl I play in that is very warm, very sweet
en_quotes.author: Salma Hayek

en_quotes.quote: I'm a romantic guy
en_quotes.author: Fred Durst

en_quotes.quote: Vetri Selvan' is the first film where I play a conventional romantic role, which I found very challenging
en_quotes.author: Radhika Apte

en_quotes.quote: I don't think of death in a romantic way anymore
en_quotes.author: Robert Smith

en_quotes.quote: I find short, fast romances romantic. There's a beauty to dark imagery
en_quotes.author: Sam Smith

en_quotes.quote: Like almost everything else from the West, the Romantic Revolution arrived late in Russia
en_quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

en_quotes.quote: I'd like to classify my life as a romantic comedy. Unfortunately I feel it's probably more like a TV reality show
en_quotes.author: Uma Thurman

en_quotes.quote: I'm a complete romantic - it's why I always get married. Someone should really stop me
en_quotes.author: Pamela Anderson

en_quotes.quote: But no, I don't really like romantic comedies, so I don't really care. I never go see 'em
en_quotes.author: John Cusack

en_quotes.quote: But romantic vision can also lead one away from certain very hard, ugly truths about life that are important to know
en_quotes.author: Donna Tartt

en_quotes.quote: I used to do an impersonation of Hulk Hogan and Randy Savage in a romantic relationship
en_quotes.author: Big Show

en_quotes.quote: My goal on my bucket list is to write a romantic comedy movie
en_quotes.author: Lynda Barry

en_quotes.quote: The most romantic thing I ever did to my woman? I painted her toenails!
en_quotes.author: Tracy Morgan

en_quotes.quote: I think romance is anything honest. As long as it's honest, it's so disarming
en_quotes.author: Kristen Stewart

en_quotes.quote: A boy is holding a girl so very tight in his arms tonight
en_quotes.author: Edward VIII

en_quotes.quote: Akshay's idea of a romantic date is a six-kilometre jog, followed by 500 crunches... together! Eeeeks!
en_quotes.author: Twinkle Khanna

en_quotes.quote: If I can be my crazy, wild self in front of a person, and he still likes me, that's romantic
en_quotes.author: Preity Zinta

en_quotes.quote: The most romantic thing a guy has ever done for me is starting a family. That's as romantic as it gets
en_quotes.author: Isla Fisher

en_quotes.quote: Almost every story has a romantic angle to it
en_quotes.author: Fawad Khan

en_quotes.quote: I may have played romantic roles, but each character has been different, with his own personality
en_quotes.author: Fawad Khan

en_quotes.quote: I would have loved to do romantic comedies. That's what I think I would be best at
en_quotes.author: Rene Russo

en_quotes.quote: The most romantic thing I've done is too personal to say
en_quotes.author: Matt Czuchry

en_quotes.quote: I want to do action, romantic comedy, and I love drama
en_quotes.author: Liya Kebede

en_quotes.quote: I was blinded by being a romantic person
en_quotes.author: Sienna Miller

en_quotes.quote: I think I'm a romantic person, yeah
en_quotes.author: Antonio Banderas

en_quotes.quote: My mom is very romantic. As is my dad. They appreciate real romance
en_quotes.author: Ansel Elgort

en_quotes.quote: Love to me has meant different things at different junctures of my life. I'm not a hopeless romantic
en_quotes.author: Randeep Hooda

en_quotes.quote: I want to create a world with objects and surroundings that are human, more romantic, and less sterile
en_quotes.author: Marcel Wanders

en_quotes.quote: I'm a bit of a romantic. In theory!
en_quotes.author: Olga Kurylenko

en_quotes.quote: When we are young, revolution is the most romantic thing
en_quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

en_quotes.quote: Romantic love is painful
en_quotes.author: will.i.am

en_quotes.quote: Having an actual income can expand your romantic horizons toward the more appealing end of the spectrum
en_quotes.author: Al Franken

en_quotes.quote: I've done romantic comedy, and I don't get to flex that muscle often
en_quotes.author: Hill Harper

en_quotes.quote: There's always something heroic and romantic about taking a stand against the powers that be
en_quotes.author: Greg Gutfeld

en_quotes.quote: I happen to know there is nothing sexy or romantic about love scenes. They are just awful to do
en_quotes.author: Keeley Hawes

en_quotes.quote: The vampire was a complete change from the usual romantic characters I was playing, but it was a success
en_quotes.author: Bela Lugosi

en_quotes.quote: That on a romantic level, if you feel it about somebody and it's pure, it means that they do too
en_quotes.author: Sean Penn

en_quotes.quote: I feel like you don't know if someone's equipped for a romantic relationship until they're out of their twenties
en_quotes.author: Lena Dunham

en_quotes.quote: I think romantic comedy, when done right, is my favorite genre. It's just a genre that's very human
en_quotes.author: Lena Dunham

en_quotes.quote: The most aggressive artists often hide their romantic side
en_quotes.author: Don Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I fell in love with many women at school who had no idea I existed. I'm a bit of a romantic
en_quotes.author: Eric Bana

en_quotes.quote: I'm a bit of a romantic
en_quotes.author: Eric Bana

en_quotes.quote: I think that romantic comedies have a special place in most people's hearts, especially the younger demographic
en_quotes.author: Noah Centineo

en_quotes.quote: I've been in silly movies and romantic movies and historic movies
en_quotes.author: Kevin Bacon

en_quotes.quote: I would pretend to be the French lieutenant's woman. I was always a romantic. I still am, actually
en_quotes.author: Helena Bonham Carter

en_quotes.quote: What is a kiss? Why this, as some approve: The sure, sweet cement, glue, and lime of love
en_quotes.author: Robert Herrick

en_quotes.quote: Bid me to love, and I will give a loving heart to thee
en_quotes.author: Robert Herrick

en_quotes.quote: I think I have a romantic idea of life; I certainly have a romantic outlook. I think. I hope
en_quotes.author: Richard E. Grant

en_quotes.quote: I am a better person when I let myself have the time for romance and for love
en_quotes.author: Diane Kruger

en_quotes.quote: I don't have any romantic ideas about marriage. Trust me. A white dress... ? No. It's not something for me
en_quotes.author: Diane Kruger

en_quotes.quote: When I was younger - it might be a romantic idea - I always thought I might go crazy
en_quotes.author: Diane Kruger

en_quotes.quote: I'm always trying to perfect the romantic comedy, though
en_quotes.author: David Duchovny

en_quotes.quote: I had no romantic interest in Gable. I considered him an older man
en_quotes.author: Gene Tierney

en_quotes.quote: I have a romantic side
en_quotes.author: Curtis Jackson

en_quotes.quote: I've done a few old-style romantic leads now
en_quotes.author: Richard Madden

en_quotes.quote: There is something romantic about the world being a diverse place, where every place has a Starbucks and Denny's
en_quotes.author: Tom Green

en_quotes.quote: The city of Oia is the most magnificently romantic place I've ever been
en_quotes.author: Lisa Ling

en_quotes.quote: Romance is mush, stifling those who strive
en_quotes.author: Billy Strayhorn

en_quotes.quote: The whole romantic part of my life was a wipeout. I didn't even own a belt
en_quotes.author: Paul Lynde

en_quotes.quote: I will never create a romantic angle to survive on a game show
en_quotes.author: Karishma Tanna

en_quotes.quote: The essence of romantic love is that wonderful beginning, after which sadness and impossibility may become the rule
en_quotes.author: Anita Brookner

en_quotes.quote: I was a late starter on the romantic front. I didn't start dating until I was in my 30s
en_quotes.author: Geri Halliwell

en_quotes.quote: I've recorded in Portuguese, too. I didn't set out to just sing ballads or romantic songs
en_quotes.author: Johnny Mathis

en_quotes.quote: I had a kind of romantic notion about being a Hollywood Errol Flynn type
en_quotes.author: Kelsey Grammer

en_quotes.quote: We are in desperate need of a well-done romantic lesbian comedy
en_quotes.author: Jill Bennett

en_quotes.quote: I think the American West really attracts me because it's romantic. The desert, the empty space, the drama
en_quotes.author: Ang Lee

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a romantic. In life I didn't have much experience with romance
en_quotes.author: Ang Lee

en_quotes.quote: I am a very romantic person, and I love 'love' - however cheesy that sounds!
en_quotes.author: Armaan Malik

en_quotes.quote: When the heart speaks, its language is the same under all latitudes
en_quotes.author: Ella Maillart

en_quotes.quote: War is terrible. There is nothing romantic about war
en_quotes.author: Martin McGuinness

en_quotes.quote: I have tender, romantic associations with upstate New York
en_quotes.author: Vera Farmiga

en_quotes.quote: Romantic love is just one aspect of love
en_quotes.author: Ann Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Full-blooded romantic love I wouldn't be able to write about
en_quotes.author: Alan Bennett

en_quotes.quote: I'm personally a hopeless romantic. I always have been
en_quotes.author: Brett Young

en_quotes.quote: I guess I'm a bit of a romantic
en_quotes.author: Felicity Jones

en_quotes.quote: I am definitely romantic, and I love romantic stories - that's why I keep making romantic movies
en_quotes.author: Felicity Jones

en_quotes.quote: I was thinking 'Love Story', obviously, was a romantic film of that time
en_quotes.author: Felicity Jones

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing romantic about teargas. Or smoke bombs or rubber bullets or sound cannons
en_quotes.author: DeRay Mckesson

en_quotes.quote: I need to be more romantic. I do. I know that's something women really appreciate
en_quotes.author: Brody Jenner

en_quotes.quote: I love romantic comedies, or romantic dramas - basically anything with love in it
en_quotes.author: Rachel Bilson

en_quotes.quote: My hairline is receding. So my days as a romantic lead - even though I've never had them - are behind me
en_quotes.author: John Lithgow

en_quotes.quote: I try to do romantic gestures all the time
en_quotes.author: Armie Hammer

en_quotes.quote: I never got the opportunity to be romantic or feel romantic with anyone
en_quotes.author: Gary Coleman

en_quotes.quote: I happen to be really a romantic
en_quotes.author: Amanda Seyfried

en_quotes.quote: My most romantic job: I was a manager at Baskin-Robbins
en_quotes.author: Eric McCormack

en_quotes.quote: Romantic comedies are usually about when love works
en_quotes.author: Zooey Deschanel

en_quotes.quote: Romantic films are not a genre I would choose
en_quotes.author: Ram Gopal Varma

en_quotes.quote: I would love to do a romantic comedy
en_quotes.author: Evan Peters

en_quotes.quote: Judy Garland was a different type of entertainer. She was a dancer, a singer, and an incurable romantic
en_quotes.author: Mickey Rooney

en_quotes.quote: I'm very romantic
en_quotes.author: Carmen Electra

en_quotes.quote: If I eat a huge meal and I can get the girl to rub my belly, I think that's about as romantic as I can think of
en_quotes.author: Ryan Gosling

en_quotes.quote: I am an incurable romantic. I am even in love with the idea of being in love, and hence, I write a lot of love songs
en_quotes.author: Adnan Sami

en_quotes.quote: Romantic music really stirs my soul. And, of course, I love Chinese music; it makes me feel closer to home
en_quotes.author: Liu Wen

en_quotes.quote: In my twenties, I wrote a lot of romantic stories in which I always lost the girl
en_quotes.author: Ruskin Bond

en_quotes.quote: Romantic love, or sex, is the only good thing in a life that is being lived in a dark way
en_quotes.author: Alan Furst

en_quotes.quote: I'm the first one who sees every romantic comedy in theaters
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Olsen

en_quotes.quote: I'm a big movie fan, and I want to make movies in every genre. I want to make my romantic comedy one day
en_quotes.author: James Wan

en_quotes.quote: My vibrato was my weakness. With romantic pieces, I could be a lot more schmaltzy. My wider vibrato fit that
en_quotes.author: Gretchen Carlson

en_quotes.quote: I don't understand why every guy is not a romantic. I enjoy it
en_quotes.author: Aaron Paul

en_quotes.quote: I had a romantic, 'Aren't I a good girl?' take on divorce, but the truth is that was stupid
en_quotes.author: Ali MacGraw

en_quotes.quote: For a romantic comedy to be three hours long, that's longer than most marriages
en_quotes.author: David Fincher

en_quotes.quote: I don't know about the romantic comedy route, although never say never
en_quotes.author: Kristen Wiig

en_quotes.quote: In my opinion, British women are more romantic than French ones
en_quotes.author: Jean-Michel Jarre

en_quotes.quote: When I was a teenager I was a total romantic escapist. My world was books
en_quotes.author: Colin Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Maybe I'm naively romantic, but I do believe that spice and excitement doesn't stop once a couple gets together
en_quotes.author: Stana Katic

en_quotes.quote: I was in romantic relationships with girls - whatever that means at 14
en_quotes.author: Matt Bomer

en_quotes.quote: There are many aspects to directing that have a romantic place in people's minds
en_quotes.author: Adam McKay

en_quotes.quote: We all have grown up watching Hindi romantic films, and when it comes to show love, that's probably how we show it
en_quotes.author: Rajkummar Rao

en_quotes.quote: I loved the whole New Romantic, New Wave thing... New Order, Soft Cell, Depeche Mode, Gary Numan, Blancmange, Yazoo
en_quotes.author: John Grant

en_quotes.quote: Is that romantic fantasy real? Um, after kids, no. Take the kids away, I don't know. Depends
en_quotes.author: Robin Wright

en_quotes.quote: I am a diehard romantic, and I shamelessly accept that. I love writing letters
en_quotes.author: Ali Fazal

en_quotes.quote: I'm a deeply romantic person, nostalgic to a fault
en_quotes.author: David Lowery

en_quotes.quote: I'm an incurable romantic. But I'm not an adrenaline junkie
en_quotes.author: John M. Grunsfeld

en_quotes.quote: I guess I'm a romantic. Call me rough and romantic. Girls like that
en_quotes.author: Mark Henry

en_quotes.quote: In short I will part with anything for you but you
en_quotes.author: Mary Wortley Montagu

en_quotes.quote: I'm turned off by the groupie thing. I'm a romantic; I like finding the right woman, and if it works, it works
en_quotes.author: Joe Perry

en_quotes.quote: I love crying at romantic movies like 'The Notebook.' I'm always bawling
en_quotes.author: Fergie

en_quotes.quote: It was a romantic dream to be a writer. It seemed like a calling
en_quotes.author: Bobbie Ann Mason

en_quotes.quote: I think there is always romantic tension between Lois Lane and Clark Kent
en_quotes.author: Gene Luen Yang

en_quotes.quote: I honestly can't think of many more truly romantic gestures than a really well-thought-through prenuptial agreement
en_quotes.author: Naomi Alderman

en_quotes.quote: I'm a big romantic, so I love guys who are romantic too
en_quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

en_quotes.quote: The American is wholeheartedly for love and romance at any cost
en_quotes.author: Leslie Caron

en_quotes.quote: Any romantic feelings for a 12-year-old are like entering into a fantasy world
en_quotes.author: Wes Anderson

en_quotes.quote: If it was a great script and a great character, I would love to do a romantic comedy
en_quotes.author: Andy Serkis

en_quotes.quote: In some sense, I'm a romantic. I like the idea of organic history and tradition
en_quotes.author: Rory Stewart

en_quotes.quote: I had a lot of romantic notions about what it would mean to cross Asia by foot
en_quotes.author: Rory Stewart

en_quotes.quote: Bip is the romantic and burlesque hero for our time. Bip is a modern-day Don Quixote
en_quotes.author: Marcel Marceau

en_quotes.quote: What I really want is to play the romantic lead and get the girl
en_quotes.author: Peter Dinklage

en_quotes.quote: I don't want to get stuck in romantic comedy
en_quotes.author: Henry Golding

en_quotes.quote: I feel like I've done a bunch of period stuff and then a bunch of romantic comedies
en_quotes.author: Kate Beckinsale

en_quotes.quote: Big romantic gestures are only as strong as the relationships they happen in
en_quotes.author: Josh Gondelman

en_quotes.quote: Audiences like me in soft, romantic roles, and 'Premam' ticks all the boxes
en_quotes.author: Naga Chaitanya

en_quotes.quote: I know most people use their phones to tell time, but there's something very romantic and beautiful about a timepiece
en_quotes.author: Padma Lakshmi

en_quotes.quote: There's something really great and romantic about being poor and sleeping on couches
en_quotes.author: Ben Affleck

en_quotes.quote: I love romantic comedy, but I think you have to have another idea that you're chasing along with romantic comedy
en_quotes.author: James L. Brooks

en_quotes.quote: To do a romantic scene is the most unromantic thing to do on screen
en_quotes.author: Yami Gautam

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a romantic
en_quotes.author: Jack Kevorkian

en_quotes.quote: In terms of level of difficulty, it would go comedy, thriller, and then romantic drama
en_quotes.author: Sydney Pollack

en_quotes.quote: I would love to play the lead in a big romantic comedy. That's definitely a dream of mine
en_quotes.author: Rosamund Pike

en_quotes.quote: I'm not romantic, and I don't like Christmas
en_quotes.author: Paula Hawkins

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a big fan of romantic comedies, believe it or not
en_quotes.author: Kate Hudson

en_quotes.quote: People in Hollywood defer to what they know, which is a white lead, particularly in romantic comedies
en_quotes.author: Lana Condor

en_quotes.quote: I love the solitary, romantic idea of writing
en_quotes.author: Rebecca Hall

en_quotes.quote: Flowers would be wasted on me. I don't like valentines. I don't need gifts. I'm a pragmatic romantic
en_quotes.author: Lisa Jewell

en_quotes.quote: I think that there is always a part of utopia in any romantic relationship
en_quotes.author: Pedro Almodovar

en_quotes.quote: I've had ideas for romantic comedies, but it would be a much more darkly comic version than what usually sells tickets
en_quotes.author: Terence Winter

en_quotes.quote: I find it incredibly romantic that people should fight for a cause they believe in and be prepared to die for it
en_quotes.author: James D'arcy

en_quotes.quote: I love romantic comedies. When I am at home, and if I want to watch something, I would probably watch a romantic comedy
en_quotes.author: Shruti Haasan

en_quotes.quote: I can't ever see myself playing the romantic lead because that's not me; I'm not that girl
en_quotes.author: Maisie Williams

en_quotes.quote: If I can do a romantic comedy with women, that's Everest to me
en_quotes.author: Joe Carnahan

en_quotes.quote: In urban America, you do not so much meet a romantic partner as inherit the product of someone else's romantic crimes
en_quotes.author: Lee Siegel

en_quotes.quote: I used to be a hopeless romantic - I fell in love with everyone I went out with
en_quotes.author: Jeremy London

en_quotes.quote: I did want a boy child because I had this romantic idea that a boy child when he's 16 takes his mother out for dinner
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Saunders

en_quotes.quote: Then I abandoned comics for fine art because I had some romantic vision of being like Vincent Van Gogh Jr
en_quotes.author: Bill Griffith

en_quotes.quote: It's tough to do a romantic scene with someone you don't like. I have been lucky so far
en_quotes.author: Sidharth Malhotra

en_quotes.quote: I enjoy doing romantic stories. I've done a lot of them
en_quotes.author: Joe Lando

en_quotes.quote: Americans have always been excellent at making romantic comedies - but dramatically, we don't really try to do it
en_quotes.author: James Gray

en_quotes.quote: There are very few movies in English about romantic obsession told with a seriousness of purpose
en_quotes.author: James Gray

en_quotes.quote: Not many foreigners move to Paris for their dream job. Many do it on a romantic whim
en_quotes.author: Pamela Druckerman

en_quotes.quote: I'm a really huge fan of the old romantic comedies from the '30s and '40s... Huge fan. I love all that stuff
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jane

en_quotes.quote: There is a romantic, often misguided, misconception among the British that life in France is akin to life in Paradise
en_quotes.author: Janine di Giovanni

en_quotes.quote: In real love you want the other person's good. In romantic love you want the other person
en_quotes.author: Margaret Anderson

en_quotes.quote: I don't have a favourite romantic scene, but I enjoy romantic movies like 'Ghost' and 'Music and Lyrics.'
en_quotes.author: Hansika Motwani

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a social singer. But if one can take a social message via the romantic, that's a strong statement
en_quotes.author: Luis Fonsi

en_quotes.quote: My music is bejewelled, it's colourful, it's romantic, it shines
en_quotes.author: Carly Rae Jepsen

en_quotes.quote: I love romantic comedies more than anything
en_quotes.author: Kevin Kwan

en_quotes.quote: My image was that of a romantic, soft hero
en_quotes.author: Rishi Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: I came into films when there was action. When I retired, it was romantic period
en_quotes.author: Rishi Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: I am very romantic. In fact, I just renewed my vows... although it was with another woman
en_quotes.author: Kevin Nealon

en_quotes.quote: I've never gotten to do romantic comedy like most of the girls. Maybe because I'm fit, people assume that I'm not funny?
en_quotes.author: Jessica Biel

en_quotes.quote: Hamilton was young, dashing, and romantic. He lent himself perfectly to be the star of a musical
en_quotes.author: Ron Chernow

en_quotes.quote: Therapy was the biggest romance of my life
en_quotes.author: Dar Williams

en_quotes.quote: I like things that start depressing and dark and end up romantic, and that's what I really loved about 'King Kong.'
en_quotes.author: Petra Haden

en_quotes.quote: Cooking is always very romantic!
en_quotes.author: Matthew Morrison

en_quotes.quote: I was married when I was 17. I knew nothing. I was full of romance
en_quotes.author: Gloria Swanson

en_quotes.quote: Deep down, classical Romantic music is what I love: Brahms, Tchaikovsky, the Romantics
en_quotes.author: Ramin Djawadi

en_quotes.quote: It's not a conscious decision that I only want to do romantic films
en_quotes.author: Aditya Roy Kapur

en_quotes.quote: I can sit in front of the TV and watch an old romantic film and be transfixed
en_quotes.author: Amber Heard

en_quotes.quote: I'm not really interested in doing a traditional romantic comedy where everything ties up neatly
en_quotes.author: Leslie Mann

en_quotes.quote: Christmas is a time of year that's so romantic
en_quotes.author: Katharine McPhee

en_quotes.quote: I don't think anybody at the major studios is rushing to offer me a romantic lead
en_quotes.author: Judge Reinhold

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a romantic lead. I have sticking-out ears and a little troll nose
en_quotes.author: Russell Tovey

en_quotes.quote: I will always be the hopeless romantic, more often pathetic than heroic
en_quotes.author: Chris Lowell

en_quotes.quote: When you are the lead in a romantic comedy, you have to worry about people really liking you
en_quotes.author: Morris Chestnut

en_quotes.quote: The curse of the romantic is a greed for dreams, an intensity of expectation that, in the end, diminishes the reality
en_quotes.author: Marya Mannes

en_quotes.quote: I love romantic films and love drama. Any film that has romance or romantic element is my comfort
en_quotes.author: Rani Mukerji

en_quotes.quote: Women love romance, but they're not as romantic as men
en_quotes.author: George Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: I always like to read something romantic about the place I'm visiting
en_quotes.author: Anouska Hempel

en_quotes.quote: Schumann's 'Quintet in E flat for Piano and Strings' is one of the sublime moments in Romantic music
en_quotes.author: Robert Gottlieb

en_quotes.quote: I'm a romantic, and I like guys to bring flowers and buy some gifts - not expensive things, just romantic things
en_quotes.author: Bai Ling

en_quotes.quote: Yeah, but there's nobody who represents romance to me like Cary Grant
en_quotes.author: Aaron Eckhart

en_quotes.quote: The desire for romantic love in marriage is deeply rooted in our psychological makeup
en_quotes.author: Gary Chapman

en_quotes.quote: I enjoy romantic comedies in general. I like them when they're bad, I like when they're good
en_quotes.author: Jessica Williams

en_quotes.quote: How did I go from 'Menace II Society' to 'Love Jones?' There wasn't a poetic moment or romantic bone in O-Dog's body
en_quotes.author: Larenz Tate

en_quotes.quote: New York has got this sort of wonderful romantic idea of the South
en_quotes.author: Josh Lucas

en_quotes.quote: I'm a big romantic, traditional, cheesy guy
en_quotes.author: Josh Hutcherson

en_quotes.quote: Perhaps I've been perceived more as a romantic comedy actor, but overall, I enjoy acting in any shape or form
en_quotes.author: Jaime Camil

en_quotes.quote: I am keen to work in romantic stories and dramas
en_quotes.author: Nora Fatehi

en_quotes.quote: When you're playing a romantic version of a real person, you're playing a version of the truth
en_quotes.author: Andrea Riseborough

en_quotes.quote: I'm a dreadful romantic. No matter what I go through in life, I want to fall in love with a man
en_quotes.author: Rachel Hunter

en_quotes.quote: I have romantic ideas about home and what it should mean
en_quotes.author: Min Jin Lee

en_quotes.quote: I am such a diehard romantic. I guess a part of me thinks I am Juliet
en_quotes.author: Olivia Hussey

en_quotes.quote: I love romantic comedies
en_quotes.author: Max Minghella

en_quotes.quote: I'm Irish in the mythic, romantic sense, but in the living sense, I'm a Londoner
en_quotes.author: Sean Scully

en_quotes.quote: I thought being a cowboy would be a terribly romantic thing to do. But it wasn't. I shoveled a lot of stalls
en_quotes.author: Bob Weir

en_quotes.quote: One of the pitfalls of a romantic comedy is that you know how it's going to end
en_quotes.author: Jason Segel

en_quotes.quote: I am not an adolescent, nor a romantic. I analyze objectively
en_quotes.author: Dilma Rousseff

en_quotes.quote: I'm a romantic at heart
en_quotes.author: Tyler Farr

en_quotes.quote: I don't like to search too much. I find it is easier when romance finds you
en_quotes.author: Michelle Trachtenberg

en_quotes.quote: My idea of a romantic night is to watch action films
en_quotes.author: Corey Hart

en_quotes.quote: I was born with a romantic nature, and I'll carry it to my grave
en_quotes.author: Telly Savalas

en_quotes.quote: I'm a romantic realist. I knew I would become a star, just as I know some day the bubble will burst
en_quotes.author: Telly Savalas

en_quotes.quote: In our romantic groves I adored her like a divinity
en_quotes.author: Anne Boyd
